entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 10:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
